item.title: Rootkit resources for you to learn (source code & books)
item.dc:creator: Panggi Libersa Jasri Akadol
item.content:encoded:
What is rootkit by the way ?

A rootkit is a software or hardware device designed to gain administrator-level control over a computer system without being detected. Although rootkits can serve a variety of ends, they gained notoriety as malware, appropriating computing resources without the knowledge of the administrators or users of affected systems. Rootkits can target the BIOS, hypervisor, boot loader, kernel or less commonly, libraries or applications.

The term rootkit is a concatenation of the administrative account in (primarily) Unix operating systems (root user account) and the word "kit", which refers to the software components that implement the tool. (wikipedia)

If you really want to learn about rootkit , you have to try to run it to see the impact ( of course in a safe environment) . After that , learn how the Operating System works . If you still don't know how , LEARN. And then , learn how to make one from the source code and modify it.

These files are my MS Windows rootkit collection (really long time ago saved in my hard drive) , but i'm sure that they are useful.

Download the compressed file here : http://static.malcoder.info/Ro0tk1t.zip

Password (to prevent server's antivirus) :Â  bf787577ff656cde5b5d1f8236a75d2a

Need something to read ? (buy the books at amazon)

  • Hacking Exposed Malware and Rootkits
  • The Rootkit Arsenal: Escape and Evasion in the Dark Corners of the System
  • Professional Rootkits (Programmer to Programmer)
  • Rootkits for Dummies

and some other books out there..

PS : i don't have any responsibility for anything because of the information i gave to you.
